key.name: headsetcontrol-executable
key.description: File and path of headsetcontrol executable

key.name: option-capabilities
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to ask for capabilities

key.name: option-battery
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to get battery

key.name: option-chatmix
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to get chatmix

key.name: option-sidetone
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set sidetone

key.name: option-led
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set led

key.name: option-inactive-time
key.summary: Parameter to ask for inactive time
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set inactive time

key.name: option-voice
key.summary: Parameter to ask for voice prompts
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set voice prompts

key.name: option-rotate-mute
key.summary: Parameter to ask for rotate to mute
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set rotate to mute

key.name: option-output-format
key.summary: Parameter to ask for all data in new output format
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to get all data - needs a newer version of headsetcontrol

key.name: option-equalizer
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set the equalizer setting

key.name: option-equalizer-settings
key.summary: Equalizer options (equalizer might not be supported by your headset)
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol as parameter to equalizer option (when supported)

key.name: option-equalizer-preset
key.description: Passed to headsetcontrol to set the equalizer preset

key.name: equalizer-preset-names
key.summary: Names of the equalizer presets (equalizer preset might not be supported by your headset)
key.description: Shown in equalizer preset menu (when supported)

key.name: notification-low-battery
key.summary: Parameter to enable notification when battery is low
key.description: Send a notification when the battery level is low

key.name: use-logging
key.description: Enable / disable log outputs

key.name: show-systemindicator
key.description: Makes the systemindicator show/hide

key.name: hidewhendisconnected-systemindicator
key.summary: Hide the systemindicator when no headset is connected
key.description: Will be delayed by refresh interval - can be enforced by toggling the quicksettings

key.name: refreshinterval-systemindicator
key.summary: Refresh the systemindicator every X minutes
key.description: Value in minutes to refresh the headset data on the systemindicator

key.name: use-colors
key.summary: Parameter to enable battery percentage text color
key.description: Makes battery percentage text colored/non-colored

key.name: color-batteryhigh
key.description: The text color for battery charge 100% to 51%

key.name: color-batterymedium
key.description: The text color for battery charge 50% to 26%

key.name: color-batterylow
key.description: The text color for battery charge 25% to 0%

key.name: sidetone-values
key.description: Used for sidetone values off, low, medium, high, max (-1 disable)

key.name: quicksettings-toggle
key.description: Enum - 0 Systemindicator, 1 Notifications, 2 Logs, 3 Colors
